cause.description:
This club embraces the changes in our Globe. With time inevitibly comes change.
The world was once cold, colder, coldest and now is enroute to becoming a more warm place.
"We are the world, we are the children We are the ones who make a brighter day so let's start giving...."
1. The Globe is naturally gonna warm
2. Man's input is minuscule at best
3. Climate change is cyclic
cause.name: Embrace Global Warming!
